sentences.en: Alexander the coppersmith did me much harm; the Lord will repay him according to his deeds.
sentences.cn: 提后4:14铜匠亚力山大多多的害我. 主必照他所行的报应他.

sentences.en: The coppersmith faced the iron bar with copper.
sentences.cn: 这铜匠把铜涂在铁条上.

sentences.en: The elderly grey - haired man is a coppersmith by trade.
sentences.cn: 那个灰头发上了年纪的人是铜匠.

sentences.en: The pawnshop had sold the plates of his Flora after the expiration of thirteen months. Some coppersmith had made stewpans of them.
sentences.cn: 那当铺，过了十三个月，便把他那套《植物图说》的铜版全卖了，几个铜匠拿去做了些平底锅。

sentences.en: Therefore, blacksmith, coppersmith, silversmith and metallurgy industry are respected Lao Tzu - Lao for the founder.
sentences.cn: 所以, 铁匠 、 铜匠 、 银匠与冶铸业均尊老子 —— 太上老君为祖师.

sentences.en: While he still went out, he had purchased of a coppersmith, for a few sous, a little copper crucifix which he had hung up on a nail opposite his bed.
sentences.cn: 当他还能上街时，他从锅匠那儿用几个苏买到一个小的铜十字架，挂在床前钉子上。

trans.tran_en: a person who works copper or copper alloys
